text: satyanni tiraskarincinavaru, tama hrdayalaloni mudha abhimanam valla, murkhapu pattu vahincinappudu, allah! Tana sandesaharuni mida mariyu visvasula mida, santini avatarimpa jesadu. Mariyu varilo daivabhitini sthira paricadu. Mariyu vare daniki hakkudarulu mariyu ar'hulu kudanu. Mariyu allah ku prati visayam gurinci baga telusu
